name: clientSessionId
label: Client Session ID
description: Returned in the Server to Server Create Client Session call. This is the identifier of the current session.

name: customerId
label: Customer ID
description: Returned in the Server to Server Create Client Session call. This is a temporary identifier for you within the session.

name: clientApiUrl
label: Client API URL
description: Returned in the Server to Server Create Client Session call. This URL points to the Worldline Client API

name: assetUrl
label: Asset URL
description: Returned in the Server to Server Create Client Session call. This URL can be used to retrieve static resources, such as payment product logo images.
